roleset.name: precipitate together in the same reaction

example.name: example with several antigens
example.text: At this stage, we cannot formally exclude that an unknown GEF, coprecipitating with Sos-1, is responsible for the observed activity.

example.name: example with agent and instrument
example.text: We coprecipitated serum Plg with the anti-M6P/IGF2R monoclonal antibody (mAb) MEM-240.
example.arg: with the anti-M6P/IGF2R monoclonal antibody (mAb) MEM-240

example.name: example with solution
example.text: The corresponding doped CeO2 samples were coprecipitated from mixed nitrate solutions.
